name: Save! Hero Goalkeeper 2019
description:
Save goals and get your team to glory!

Save! Hero - Soccer Goalkeeper is a very addictive and intuitive soccer game for football fans to feel like a pro goalkeeper in the field.

The stadium is waiting to their soccer hero, you are under the crossbar very focused on the shot. Your opponent is going to shot to score a goal... don't permit it! As a pro Goalkeeper you have to save the best soccer goals in a match, to make your team score and win the season cup!

Train hard with your soccer team and upgrade your equipment getting the best goalkeeper outfits in our Pack Opening; in this soccer game, there are a lot of incredible equipments for your goalkeeper so you have to play to achieve new loot and open the packs!

REAL SOCCER ACTION - Feel like a real soccer match with different football plays and
animations.

LOOT SYSTEM - Get special rewards opening packs like incredible outfits.

ADDICTIVE GAMEPLAY - Touch to save! You have to touch the right side on the goal to
save goals and become a legend!

Download now Save! Hero Soccer Goalkeeper 2019 and play from the net to save all the goals you can! The best soccer game for goalkeepers.
